createassignment.name: CreateAssignment
createassignment.description: Grants permission to create a user or group assignment for an Amazon Q Developer Profile

createplugin.name: CreatePlugin
createplugin.description: Grants permission to create and configure a third party plugin in Amazon Q

deleteassignment.name: DeleteAssignment
deleteassignment.description: Grants permission to delete a user or group assignment for an Amazon Q Developer Profile

deleteplugin.name: DeletePlugin
deleteplugin.description: Grants permission to delete a configured plugin in Amazon Q

generatecodefromcommands.name: GenerateCodeFromCommands
generatecodefromcommands.description: Grants permission to generate code from CLI commands in Amazon Q

getconversation.name: GetConversation
getconversation.description: Grants permission to get individual messages associated with a specific conversation with Amazon Q

getidentitymetadata.name: GetIdentityMetadata
getidentitymetadata.description: Grants permission to Amazon Q to get the identity metadata

getplugin.name: GetPlugin
getplugin.description: Grants permission to view information about a specific configured Amazon Q plugin

gettroubleshootingresults.name: GetTroubleshootingResults
gettroubleshootingresults.description: Grants permission to get troubleshooting results with Amazon Q

listconversations.name: ListConversations
listconversations.description: Grants permission to list individual conversations associated with a specific Amazon Q user

listpluginproviders.name: ListPluginProviders
listpluginproviders.description: Grants permission to list available plugins in Amazon Q

listplugins.name: ListPlugins
listplugins.description: Grants permission to list configured plugins in Amazon Q

listtagsforresource.name: ListTagsForResource
listtagsforresource.description: Grants permission to list all tags associated with an Amazon Q resource

passrequest.name: PassRequest
passrequest.description: Grants permission to allow Amazon Q to perform actions on your behalf

sendmessage.name: SendMessage
sendmessage.description: Grants permission to send a message to Amazon Q

startconversation.name: StartConversation
startconversation.description: Grants permission to start a conversation with Amazon Q

starttroubleshootinganalysis.name: StartTroubleshootingAnalysis
starttroubleshootinganalysis.description: Grants permission to start a troubleshooting analysis with Amazon Q

starttroubleshootingresolutionexplanatio.name: StartTroubleshootingResolutionExplanation
starttroubleshootingresolutionexplanatio.description: Grants permission to start a troubleshooting resolution explanation with Amazon Q

tagresource.name: TagResource
tagresource.description: Grants permission to associate tags with an Amazon Q resource

untagresource.name: UntagResource
untagresource.description: Grants permission to remove tags associated with an Amazon Q resource

updatetroubleshootingcommandresult.name: UpdateTroubleshootingCommandResult
updatetroubleshootingcommandresult.description: Grants permission to update a troubleshooting command result with Amazon Q

useplugin.name: UsePlugin
useplugin.description: Grants permission to use Amazon Q plugins
